title: 5 authors I won't read again
summary:
Find links to every where you can connect with me here: https://linktr.ee/criminolly
_____
Books discussed:
Octopus by Matt Shaw
Sick Bastards by Matt Shaw
The Humans by Matt Haig
The Midnight Library by Matt Haig
Watership Down by Richard Adams
Old Man's War by John Scalzi
The Kaiju Preservation Society by John Scalzi
A Court of Thorns and Rose by Sarah J Maas
A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J Maas
A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J Maas
A Court of Frost and Starlight by Sarah J Maas
